rev.comment: /* Mutualism */ added accurate and vetted clarification on Pierre-Joseph Proudhon's actual political positions and activities.

/* Post-classical currents */ "Anarcho-capitalism" makes no sense. Anarchism is anti-capitalist.

anarchism includes strong anti-collectivist individualist tendencies
Updating sentence start with "The publication staunchly advocated [[free love]] ..."

a more specific term. "Theories" is too vague
a better well sourced definition. the previous one was unsourced
plenty of social anarchists think this way
the views of anarcho-capitalism are minoritarian and controversial within anarchism and so they do not represent all anarchism

i don´t know what you have against anarchism being more than anti-statism. anyway such a big edition in the structure in a wikipedia "good article" should come with more discussion in talk section
most articles about political philosophies have "overview" sections; definitions conflict so I'm making "descriptions" part (anarchism as anti-state IS the traditional definition)
i reckon this makes more sense
"extreme" is too subjective observation and it is applied to both Godwin and Striner
see talk section. I didn´t add again mention of anarchism without adjectives so as to wait for arguments againts that
support for affirmation about widely extende use of "libertarian" as synonym for "anarchist"
1 - your assertion is at odds with the article's definition of "anarchism" (so take it to discussion) and 2 - why does this mean you have to do a mass revert? (i.e. criticism section edit)
anarchism is not reducible to anti-statism. the word anarchy refers to "rulers" in general
superfluous, or at least shouldn't be in overview (this says nothing ABOUT anarchism)
this probably works the best, since groups that oppose anarchism are also "competing", and marxism is arguably a type of anarchism
/* Criticism */ related theories? That could be contentious, but competing is more clear.
consistent with: existentialism consequentialism utilitarianism positivism communism capitalism etc
an issue which generated some criticism in anarcho-comunism article and so it was dealt with in this way
instead on overemphasis on Godwin a mention on USA and later european individualist anarchists is necesary
